data.title: Customer Service Guidelines
data.aiInstructions: Use this document to guide customer service interactions and maintain consistent service quality.
data.contentPreview:
Customer Service Guidelines

1. Always greet customers warmly
2. Listen actively to their concerns
3. Provide clear and helpful solutions...

data.title: Product Demo Video
data.aiInstructions: Reference this video when customers need product demonstrations or onboarding assistance.

data.title: Troubleshooting Knowledge Base
data.aiInstructions: Direct customers to this knowledge base for technical issues and self-service support.

data.title: Email Response Template
data.aiInstructions: Use this template structure for formal email responses to customer inquiries.

data.title: API Documentation
data.aiInstructions: Reference this documentation when helping customers with API integration questions.
